questions.question: What is Triangles?
questions.answer: Triangles is an online platform that connects students with exciting opportunities worldwide including competitions, hackathons, MUNs, events, and more.

questions.question: How does Triangles work?
questions.answer: Students can create a profile on Triangles and search for opportunities that match their interests and goals. They can then apply directly to the organizations offering the opportunities through our platform.

questions.question: Is Triangles free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, Triangles is a free platform for students. Though the opportunities may have participation fees.

questions.question: How do I find opportunities on Triangles?
questions.answer: You can use the search bar on the homepage to search for opportunities. You can also filter your search results by various criteria.

questions.question: How do I apply for an opportunity?
questions.answer: Each opportunity listing on Triangles will include application instructions.

questions.question: What if I don't find any opportunities that interest me?
questions.answer: Triangles is constantly adding new opportunities. You can also check back regularly to see if new opportunities have been added that match your interests.

questions.question: Can I contact the organizations offering opportunities directly?
questions.answer: Yes, you can contact the organizations directly using the contact information provided in the opportunity listing.

questions.question: How can I contact Triangles?
questions.answer: If you have any questions or need assistance, or for collaboration-related queries, you can contact Triangles support team or reach out to us at contact@triangles.site.
